name: Hentai Go
description:
Sexual Girl - Puzzle game designed for a pleasant pastime. The goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. The whole gameplay is accompanied by pleasant and relaxing music.

Особенности:
  • Size range 3x4, 4x5, 5x7
  • Simple mouse control
  • Traditional logical gameplay
  • Gallery
  • Steam achievements
  • High score table
